io.sarl.lang.core

Class AgentTrait

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.AgentTrait
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Behavior, Skill

    public abstract class AgentTrait
extends Object
    This class represents a part of trait of an agent.
    Version:
    0.5.0 2017-03-18 17:42:59
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

      • getSkill

        @Pure
protected final <S extends Capacity> S getSkill(Class<S> capacity)
        Replies the skill corresponding to the given capacity.

        The return may never be null. If not capacity was set, the exception UnimplementedCapacityException is thrown.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity to search for the implementation.
        Returns:
        the skill, never null

      • $castSkill

        @Pure
protected <S extends Capacity> S $castSkill(Class<S> capacity,
                                                  ClearableReference<Skill> skillReference)
        Cast the skill reference to the given capacity type.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the expected capacity type.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the expected capacity type.
        skillReference - the skill reference.
        Returns:
        the skill casted to the given capacity.

      • $getSkill

        protected ClearableReference<Skill> $getSkill(Class<? extends Capacity> capacity)
        Replies the skill corresponding to the given capacity.

        The return may never be null. If not capacity was set, the exception UnimplementedCapacityException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity to search for the implementation.
        Returns:
        the reference to the skill, never null

      • operator_mappedTo

        protected <S extends Skill> void operator_mappedTo(Class<? extends Capacity> capacity,
                                                   S skill)
        Defines the implementation of the "capacity maps-to skill" operator.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of skill to be mapped to.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the implemented capacity.
        skill - - the skill to associate to the capacity.

protected final <S extends Skill> S setSkill(S skill,
                                                          Class<? extends Capacity>... capacities)
        Set the skill for the Capacity capacity.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the skill.
        Parameters:
        skill - implementaion of capacity.
        capacities - the capacity or the capacities to set.
        Returns:
        the skill that was set.

        protected <S extends Capacity> S clearSkill(Class<S> capacity)
        Clears the Skill associated with the capacity.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - the type of the capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - the capacity for which the skill must be cleared.
        Returns:

      • hasSkill

        @Pure
protected boolean hasSkill(Class<? extends Capacity> capacity)
        Checks if this agent has a Skill that implements the Capacity capacity.
        Parameters:
        capacity - - capacity to check
        Returns:
        true if it has a skill associate to this capacity, false otherwise

      • isMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isMe(Address address)
        Replies if the given address is one of the addresses of this agent. The test is done on the identifier replied by Address.getUUID().
        Parameters:
        address - - the address to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given address is one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isMe(UUID uID)
        Replies if the given identifier corresponds to the identifier of this agent.

        This function is equivalent to:

        
 id.equals( agent.getID() )
        Parameters:
        uID - - the identifier to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given identifier is the one of this agent, otherwise false.

      • isFromMe

        @Pure
protected boolean isFromMe(Event event)
        Replies if the given event was emitted by this agent.
        Parameters:
        event - - the event to test.
        Returns:
        true if the given event was emitted by this agent; otherwise false.
